data.text: @mickypassik Both Maigret and Line of Duty would have to be acquired directly from BBC by individual PBS stations like CPT. Neither are on PBS nationally. Going back several years, how about MI5, which might be my favorite.

@tellyspotting Luther, the fall, the tunnel, shetland, bodyguard, marcella, Call The midwife,  scott& bailey-wait can i still claim a favorite? Loved them all, last tango in halifax, broadchurch & more!  Did not see line of duty or maigret, will they be on pbs? Not on Netflix or amazon.
@mickypassik Love Happy Valley. Try Line of Duty, Luther, and if you haven’t seen the new Maigret starring Rowan Atkinson, it’s a must.
